name: Toot Toot
description:
Made for GBC Jam in 6 hours. Requires 2 controllers and players. About

Toot Toot is a strategy tooting game where you toot to call your allies. Play your trumpet and siege your opponent's castle to win!

How to Play

Press A, B or X to call an ally. Each button calls a different ally. Certain allies are strong against some and weak against others.

Defend your castle! The first person to make their opponent's castle fall wins!

Tools
  • Unity
    • iTween
    • Textmesh Pro
  • FMOD
  • Reaper
  • Photoshop
  • Illustrator
Soundtrack Credits

  • Sebastian Scaini
  • Patrick Flattery
